name: Sharp Wands - WIP
description:
Sharp wands let's you fight your friends in a couch-coop experiece with multiple playable characters, different game modes fully customizable, statuses and many obstacles to avoid and use at your own advantage!

 Each character has a common moveset, which includes combo melee, charged melee, combo ranged, charged ranged and guard. You can currently playing as a Crusader and a Warlock. Every character deals a different amount of damage and stagger, forcing you to change your playstyle in order to win the game

There are currently 2 different game modes: Deathmatch and Capture the Flag. Each mode has a set of parameters that improve replayablity by changing the match parameters such as rounds, duration, score target... With 3+ players there is also the option to set teams. Team up and support each other to win the game!

RIght now there are just a handful of maps to play with, but more are on the way, as well as many more obstacles and statuses to make every match diverse and memorable.

The game is still in development. If you want to help providing feedback you can enter the discord server telling your opinion on the current status of the game discord.gg/SwvZaMjbHU
